A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I thought the movie was great\, it was Star Wars but with some fresh and long needed changes. Less of a repeat of the last few films in the saga and more something new. I like to think of it as a changing of the the guard.

People complained the last movie was to much of the same and now that they did something different they complain it is to different. I say be your own judge of the film. Don't come in to this one expecting to go a particular way\, let the story guide you not public reviewed.

Although not perfect\, I truly felt this was a great film.
